00030   template < class ReturnType , 
00031     class ClassType  , 
00032     class Param1     ,
00033     class Param2     ,
00034     class Param3     
00035     >
00036   class Delegate3 : public DelegateBase 
00037   {
00038   ClassType* m_class_obj;
00039   ReturnType (ClassType::*m_method)(Param1,Param2,Param3);
00040   Param1 m_val1;
00041   Param2 m_val2;
00042   Param3 m_val3;
00043   Delegate3(){}
00044   public:
00045   Delegate3(ClassType* class_obj,
00046     ReturnType (ClassType::*method)(Param1,Param2,Param3),
00047     Param1 val1 = Param1(),
00048     Param2 val2 = Param2(),
00049     Param3 val3 = Param3()):
00050     m_class_obj(class_obj), m_method(method),
00051     m_val1(val1),m_val2(val2),m_val3(val3)
00052     {}
00053   virtual ~Delegate3(){}
00054   void operator()()
00055   {
00056   (*m_class_obj.*m_method)(m_val1,m_val2,m_val3);
00057     }    
00058   ReturnType operator()(Param1 val1,Param2 val2,Param3 val3)
00059   {
00060     return (*m_class_obj.*m_method)(val1,val2,val3);
00061   }
00062   void Invoke()
00063   {
00064   (*m_class_obj.*m_method)(m_val1,m_val2,m_val3);
00065     }    
00066   ReturnType Invoke(Param1 val1,Param2 val2,Param3 val3)
00067   {
00068     return (*m_class_obj.*m_method)(val1,val2,val3);
00069   }
00070   };
